bill.title: Alimony
bill.description: Amend The South Carolina Code Of Laws By Adding Section 20-3-165 So As To Authorize The Department Of Social Services' Division Of Child Support Enforcement To Enforce Certain Alimony Obligations; By Amending Section 20-3-130, Relating To Award Of Alimony, So As To Make Conforming Changes; By Amending Sections 63-17-710, 63-17-720, 63-17-730, 63-17-750, 63-17-760, 63-17-850, 63-17-1010, 63-17-1020, 63-17-1050, 63-17-1210, 63-17-1410, 63-17-1510, 63-17-1810, 63-17-1890, 63-17-1910, 63-17-2310, 63-17-2320, 63-17-2330, And Article 21 Of Chapter 17, Title 63, All Relating In Part To Child Support Enforcement, So As To Make Conforming Changes; By Amending Sections 20-1-350, 27-23-10, 41-35-140, 44-63-60, 44-63-80, 44-63-84, 44-63-86, And 44-63-110, Relating To Marriage Licenses, Fraudulent Conveyances, Unemployment Compensation, And Vital Records, All So As To Make Conforming Changes; By Allowing Retroactive Application Of The Act; And For Other Purposes.
